content: sidetracked. It is really important to her that she handles all Githyanki-related affairs her way. Really enjoys pissing off Shadowheart and doing the opposite of what Shadowheart like most of the time. Sometimes they agree. Views Githyanki's principles and ideas as superior. Agreeing with her way of thinking gains approval. For example, hates pursuing every other method of removing the tadpole other than going straight to the Creche. Her few instances of "Good Deeds" that she approves are align
